messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group with 15 scholars. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Raj is connected to Nisha, Ian, Sara, and Kim. Jing is connected to  Reza, Moin, Pari, and Max. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Nisha is connected to Ian, Sara, and Max. Reza is connected to Moin, and Pari. Kim is connected to Pam. Ian is connected to Sara, and Max. Moin is connected to Pari. Puja is connected to Pam. Sara is connected to Max. What is the shortest path from Amir to Max? Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Answer: (Ashish, Ashish, Nisha, (Reza, (Moin, Pari)); Ian, Max)
Explanation: Pareto optimality can be understood as the situation in which every "individual can do everything, but no one individual can do everything" (Wikipedia quote) in the economy. Economists have looked at ways to minimize the number of individuals who cannot satisfy their given needs and constraints, to reach the Pareto-optimal solution.
Pareto optimality, Pareto efficiency, and the Pareto principle (1915)
The principles of economics
Pareto Principle vs Criteria of Pareto Optimality
More Pareto optimality resources
Achievement motivation refers to an individual's striving to achieve a goal or task.
A motivation to attain a goal. The act and urge of moving toward goals that give us pleasure and purpose.
Achieving goals that are difficult to attain requires a level of effort beyond other tasks. A motivation is a goal - the need to achieve it or overcome the obstacle or challenge of any goal is what drives us. You can have motivations and then set targets to achieve and motivate yourself to get there.
Sometimes you will be motivated to meet and achieve something, other times you'll be motivated for more abstract and long-term objectives. Either way, motivation helps us achieve our goals but also creates a drive to keep us working toward them.
Self-motivation is a driving goal to set your life on a successful path. Motivation can help drive you to meet personal and professional goals and help lead you into your best life.
Motivation is the thing that gets you out of bed in the morning. It's the force that gets you up the the treadmill to run that 5K. It's the reason you get your homework in. Motivation is what drives you to go to work every day and stay at work every day. - It's what keeps you moving, it keeps you dreaming of a better, more successful future for yourself. It's inspiration, it's action, it's purpose. All in all, motivation is the single greatest force there is when it comes to achieving success.
1. Intrinsic motivation means that
